title: jeremypwr
author: jeremypwr
content: UFC on ESPN 50 Multi Master Challenge   Prizes1st place: 3 mBTC Free Bet2nd place: 2 mBTC Free Bet3rd place: 1 mBTC Free BetThe Rules are similar to the original Sportsbet.io Multi Master that we all enjoyed so muchRulesa)  Predict the winner of each match (earn 1-2 points)b)  Predict how many matches will NOT go the Full Distance (will be adjusted accordingly if matches get cancelled)Odds @ https://sportsbet.io/sports/mma/ufc/ufc-fight-night-sandhagen-vs-nurmagomedov/matchesMatches(2 points each)11. Cory Sandhagen vs. Rob Font(must get 11 correct to proceed)10. Jessica Andrade vs. Tatiana Suarez9. Dustin Jacoby vs. Kennedy Nzechukwu8. Gavin Tucker vs. Diego Lopes7. Tanner Boser vs. Aleksa Camur6. Ignacio Bahamondes vs. Ludovit Klein(1 point each)5. Raoni Barcelos vs. Kyler Phillips4. Jeremiah Wells vs. Carlston Harris3. Billy Quarantillo vs. Damon Jackson2. Jake Hadley vs. Cody Durden1. Ode Osbourne vs. Asu AlmabaevNOT go the Full Distance   Make sure your Prediction is in this format    Example11. Cory Sandhagen 10. Jessica Andrade 9. Dustin Jacoby 8. Gavin Tucker 7. Tanner Boser 6. Ignacio Bahamondes 5. Raoni Barcelos 4. Jeremiah Wells 3. Billy Quarantillo 2. Jake Hadley 1. Ode Osbourne NOT go the Full Distance 4(Small print)* Must be active in Gambling and/or Gambling discussion (some exceptions) *** The declared winners are final and up to my discretion **

comments.author: jeremypwr
comments.body: Sportsbet.io has been kind enough to sponsor my Prediction Contests and Promos for a while now.Sportsbet.io is a sports betting website; therefore these Prediction Contests and Promos are catered to those who actually bet on/discuss sports.Given the nature of my threads, please do not bother making a Prediction if you have not read the OP and qualify.If you are unsure if you qualify, just shoot me a PM.  Thank you for your cooperation.
